TopicTitle: All of my saves are gone.

Articles.Content:
All of my saves just went gone, I was working on a duna mission then boom, its gone.

nothing in recycling absolutely nothing.

Hey @JakGamingKSP,

You should have a couple of auto backups into your \saves\<career name>\backup folder, did you try to copy those back to the save games folder and load any of those?

Else I don't see how I could help you, I'm sorry.

Just an advise for the future, make regularly backups of your whole KSP folder to avoid such situations.

2 hours ago, VoidSquid said:

Hey @JakGamingKSP,

You should have a couple of auto backups into your \saves\<career name>\backup folder, did you try to copy those back to the save games folder and load any of those?

Else I don't see how I could help you, I'm sorry.

Just an advise for the future, make regularly backups of your whole KSP folder to avoid such situations.

saves literally dont exist.. wiped clean from existence

22 minutes ago, JakGamingKSP said:

saves literally dont exist.. wiped clean from existence

It could be a failure of your storage device (Hard Drive or SSD)

If that happended, then press F to pay respects to your saves.

Tho, if there was not any failure, have a look around in your folders, maybe you could find out that you moved it out, or even search in the Trash, for misterious reasons things can end up there, already happended to me.

1 minute ago, Commodore_32 said:

It could be a failure of your storage device (Hard Drive or SSD)

If that happended, then press F to pay respects to your saves.

Tho, if there was not any failure, have a look around in your folders, maybe you could find out that you moved it out, or even search in the Trash, for misterious reasons things can end up there, already happended to me.

nothing in bin also..

welp, im probably just going to suck it up and do a new save.
